```{r pressure, plotly=TRUE,warning=FALSE,error=FALSE,eval=TRUE}
to_plot=plot_together()
ll<-htmltools::tagList()
for(one in c(1:4)){
  if("plotly" %in% class(to_plot[[one]])){
    #证明是plot
    ll[[one]]<-ggplotly(to_plot[[one]])
  }else{
    #证明是未剥离完的list
    ll[[one]]<-ggplotly(to_plot[[one]][[1]])
  }
  print(one)
}
```
